message:
Running command: applypatch << 'PATCH'
*** Begin Patch
*** Update File: reproduce_issue.py
@@
-# Now load category.py from the repo
-category_path = Path(__file__).resolve().parents[1] / 'matplotlib' / 'lib' / 'matplotlib' / 'category.py'
+# Now load category.py from the repo. Use an explicit path relative to the
+# workspace root so this script works whether run from /workspace or from the
+# matplotlib subdirectory.
+category_path = Path(__file__).resolve().parent / 'matplotlib' / 'lib' / 'matplotlib' / 'category.py'
*** End Patch
PATCH
